password.noPassword: You haven't set a password yet! go to setting to set it.

blockItems.regexNote: Note: If you're unfamiliar with Regex (Regular Expressions), you can skip this page.
blockItems.wordNote: Note: Avoid using single letters or short words (e.g., 'a'), as this will block all websites containing the letter 'a'.
blockItems.groupLabel: Enter a name for the new website group(ex: E-Commerce)

deactivation.title: Deactivation Settings
deactivation.note: Note: This feature is designed to make deactivation take some effort, encouraging you to stay focused and keep working

radio.question: Answering a Question
radio.questionLabel: Number of tries before showing answer
radio.passwordTooltip: Youâ€™ll need to enter the password each time you access the settings.
radio.clickTooltip: Requires clicking a button multiple times to unlock the extension.
radio.clickLabel: Number of clicks required to unlock

schedule.title: Work Schedule
schedule.titleTooltip: Blocks websites during the specified working days and hours.
schedule.note: Note: To enable this setting, activate the tool and set your preferred working hours/days.

aboutTab.title: About The Extension
aboutTab.description1: Stay Focused is an open-source Chrome extension designed to block distracting websites, such as social media platforms.
aboutTab.description2: The concept is simple: you might start working, only to find yourself scrolling through social media like Facebook for 30 minutes without realizing it. This extension displays a reminder image to help you get back to work.

popup.focusModeEnabled: Focus mode is enabled, and you have set lock mechanism to unlock

shared.socialMediaShare: Enjoy using Stay Focused? Share it with your friends!
shared.buyMeACoffee: Love staying focused? Buy me a coffee to support updates and keep you on track!
